name: Datura Mini
description:
This project is in development - content is unfinished and subject to change.

Pick your action-girl duo and tag-team your way through 6 stages of mob-mowing and trap-dodging arcade mayhem. Both party members make up two halves of your moveset so find the perfect match to slash, shoot, and platform your way to a top score!

Datura Mini is a simple project aiming to create a pure arcade score-attack experience through the lens of action platforming. Enemies appear easy to dispatch, but memorization and skill are required to get through each stage quickly and with a high score.

  • Pair up 2 characters from a roster of 6 (and maybe more) - each with their own triplet of attacks and additional defensive ability - and find which movesets complement each other best
  • Maximize your score by setting record times, hunting down every enemy, and hitting the bonus tokens scattered throughout each stage
  • Keep attacks varied to fill the Hyper gauge - once it's full, activating Hyper Mode will add devastating effects to all attacks, as well as a score multiplier that slowly climbs if you can take out enough enemies before Hyper Mode runs out

Controls [Xinput in brackets]

Enter  [A/Start]:  Confirm
Arrow Keys  [D-Pad]:  Menu navigation/Movement
Space  [A]:  Jump
Z  [X]:  Attack (character 1)
X  [Y]:  Attack (character 2)
D  [---]:  Attack (current character)
A  [LB]:  Defend (character 1)
S  [RB]:  Defend (character 2)
C  [---]:  Defend (current character)
Shift  [B]:  Hyper mode
F  [---]:  Switch characters

Follow development (and a lot of non-development fair warning): https://twitter.com/A_Kei_KI
